channel.title: [SFoL] Rainbows and Sunshine - SIGNUPS
channel.description:
**General Gameplay Information**
@Soulshade55r is the co-host, his rulings are equal to mine when it comes to rulebreaks :^)
Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 24 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist
Gameplay
* Days last for 14 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last for 10 hours. * All actions must be sent to a mod. * Unseen/Cult/Christis will speak through their night actions in a discord server. They may not speak during the day in this chat, breaking this rule will result in a modkill. * The priest may speak to the dead through a seperate discord server. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
Rolelist
King (70% Good, 30% Christis / Unseen / Cult The Pasifist/Mastermind/Cult Leader The Crusader/Assassin/Random Cult Prince Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Random Blue Dragon Neutral Killing Neutral Non-killing Neutral Non-killing
## [Roles](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
Christis ( *Must see Blue Dragon and the Neutral killer defeted* )
Summary
>**The Pacifist** **Christis Special** **Ascension (Passive)** - When you die, the oldest non-Crusader member of the Christis will become the next Pacifist. **Sacrifice (Passive)** - If you die all Christis will gain 2 Points. **Empowerment (Day)** - Make a fellow member Immune and appear as Blue Dragon tonight - 2 Points **Last efforts (Day** ) - Become a Crusader if you cannot convert anyon - 1 Use. **Invite (Night)** - Convert someone to become a Christis. - Infinite [1 Day cool down] **Buff (Night)** - Let somone gain 4 Points - Infinite.
>**The Crusader** **Christis Killer** **Fall, my tears** (Passive) - If you turned into this class from the Pacifist, you will not have limited kills. **Ascension (Passive)** - If you die the oldest member of the Christis will become the next Crusader. If you are the last member of the Christis alive you will become the Pacifist. **Rot (Day)** - Make somone bleed out and die in two days - 1 Point [Max 4 uses] **Brand (Day)** - Make someone appear evil tonight - 2 Points. **Murder (Night)** - Kill someone tonight - 1 Point. **Brutal Attack (Night)** - Kill someone, making them bleed and die the next day, if protected or Immune - 2 Points.
>**The Slave** . (Butler Convert) **Christis Offensive** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Pull Rank (Day)** - Your vote will count as two today. This will not be announced publicly or affect the number of votes required to reach majority. - 1 point **Frame (Night)** - Frame a Target a player and learn if any and which of these things happens to them tonight. - 1 point *They were successfully Investigated. They were successfully Occupied. Their target was successfully swapped. Bounty Fraud (Night) - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional trial and execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day, this will also frame the player. You cannot target King. - 2 points*
>**The Maudlin** . (Drunk Convert) **Christis Offensive** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Debauchery (Night)** - Force a player to target a second of your choice. (you won’t be immune to attacks or conversion if you force them to target you) - 1 Point. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy a player, and disable any death or occupy immunity they have for the night. - 2 Points.
>**The Time Traveller** (Chronmancer Convert) **Christis Support** **Pocket Dimension (Day)** - If you die tonight, delay it for 2 nights. This will delay bleeding in addition to attacks. - 2 Points. **Time Snatch (Night)** - If they are bleeding you’ll kill them tonight - 2 Points. **Construct Reality (Night)** - players trying to target who you select will self target - 1 Point.
>**The Magician** (Court Wizard Convert) **Christis Support** **Pants on fire (Day)** - If someone uses a day ability targeted at someone they will self target, Doesn’t effect Neutral killers and Prince - 1 Point **Tornado (Night)** - Swap two players around swapping there visits and visitors - 1 Point. **Nightmare Spell (Night)** - Give someone false feedback of your choice if investigative - 2 Points
Feedback.
*Make target look Blue Dragon*
*Make target look Neutral*
*Make target look Christis*
*Make target believe they where occupied*
*Make target believe they where redirected to [x]*
>**The Commander** (Knight Convert) **Christis Killer** **Second plan (Night)** - If the Crusaders Kill fails you will kill that target - 1 Point. **Protection (Night)** - Prevent visitors on who you target tonight - 2 Points.
>**The Trapper** (Hunter Convert) **Christis Offensive** **Trappers Mark (Day)** - target two players if the first targets the second at night you’ll occupy them. - 0.5 points. **Nettle Trap** - Place a trap on someone Occupying visitors, Trap stays on until activated. - 2 Points. **Spite Trap** - Occupy a player and there visitors - 2 Points.
>**The Trainer** (Squire Convert) **Christis Support** **Train** - Become the converted class of a dead Blue Dragon player, or a dead Christis - Infinite.
>**The Practitioner** (Physician Convert) **Christis Support** Exhume (Day) - Learn what killed a player - 1 Point. Night Ability(1) - Innocent Heal, Protect a player and cure there bleeding, making them appear BD. - 1 Point. Night Ability(2) - Weak Spot, You’ll make sure the Crusader kills tonight, unless jailed or night Immune - 2 Points.
>**The Dexorcist** (Exorcist Convert) **Christis Social** **Snoop (Day)** - Take someone’s log books - 1 Point. **Uncover (Day)** - Uncover, Learn who the prince is Jailing tonight - 1 Point **Forge (Night)** - Leave fake log books out if your target dies. - 1 Point. **Rumour (Day)** - Make someone appear as a class of your choosing to investigatives - 1 Point
>**The Patrician** (Noble Convert) **Christis Social** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Friendship (Passive)** - You’ll be able to talk to [X] and [X] at night all both know each other but won’t know each others classes, the chat is disabled when two of you die. **Noble Twin (Day)** - Your vote count will be double, but won’t be announced - 1 Point. **Intrigue (Night)** - Listen to feedback on a player, also framing them - 1 Point.
>**The Widow** (Princess Convert) **Christis Investigative** Bat eyelashes (Night) - Learn the class type of a player and there faction - 1 Point. Seduce (Night) - Learn the full class of someone - 3 Points.
>**The Mistress** (Maid Convert) **Christis Investigative** **Compare** (Night) - Match two players if they share the same class type you’ll learn what classes they are, if they don’t you’ll learn two class types they could be. - 1 Point. **Finding Match** - Learn the class types of two players - 2 Points.
>**The Stalker** (Observer Convert) **Christis Investigative** **I see you! (Passive)** - you’ll know who visits the Christis at night. **Following Bird (Day)** - Place a birde that will permanently follow someone - 1 Point. **Tracking Bird (Day)** - Place a Birde that will permanently Watch someone - 1 Point. **Watch Carefully (Passive)** - Follow someone seeing who visits them and who they visit - 1 Point.
**Any questions regarding Christis can be asked to @Soulshade55r**
